```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results = FALSE}
#
# import
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)
library(dplyr)
library(plotly)
library(viridis)
library(knitr)

ecdc_flist <-list.files(path = "../WHO-site/report/presentation")
Link <- c()
Data <- c()
presentation <- c()
for (i in 1:length(ecdc_flist)){
  Link[i] <- sprintf("./%s/%s", "report/presentation", ecdc_flist[i])
  #Data[i] <- substr(ecdc_flist[i], start=27,stop =36)
  Data[i] <- substr(ecdc_flist[i], start=1,stop =80)
  presentation[length(ecdc_flist)+1-i] <-  sprintf ("[%s](%s)", Data[i], Link[i])
}

```


### AESE Presentation 2020 04 24
